bodyV2.markdown:
An eTicket is a PDF attached to an email, which you can open directly on your phone. It contains a unique ticket verification (QR code) which is scanned upon entering a venue.

How to use an eTicket?

  1. Open the email we sent you confirming the booking. 
  2. There will be a pink button saying "Download Tickets" under your order details, click this to be taken to your PDF eTicket.
  3.  Download the PDF eTicket to your phone.
  4.  Display the eTicket to staff when you arrive at the theatre.
